abstract:
Hey Jay, I’m from Paris and I really like your videos. On this one you forgot to mention la butte aux cailles which is located in the deep south of the 13th. It is a great mix of more ancient buildings, street art (from the famous Miss.Tic) and some good food as well (if you don’t know it try Chez Gladine) and it is a hill (a small Montmartre without the Sacre Cœur). Have a nice day !
Alice
A series about The Loire a velo or a wheelo would be great  . U could do chateau a day- it would be wheelie good 👏
Hi Jay, I will be visiting Paris in June, may I ask if there will be a meet up event possibly in June? I would love to say hi. Take care!
